mapper.select: SELECT ctwnd.*,ctcant.cantID,ctcant.CantName, ctcant.cantCampusID,ctcampus.campusID,ctcampus.CampusName FROM ctwnd,ctcant,ctcampus WHERE ctwnd.WndCantID = ctcant.cantID and ctcant.CantCampusID=ctcampus.campusID ORDER BY WndCantID DESC, WndID DESC
SELECT * FROM ctwnd,ctcant,ctcampus WHERE ctwnd.WndID=#{wndID} and ctwnd.WndCantID = ctcant.cantID and ctcant.CantCampusID=ctcampus.campusID

UPDATE ctwnd SET ctwnd.WndCantID= #{wndCantID}, ctwnd.WndName= #{wndName}, ctwnd.WndAddr= #{wndAddr}, ctwnd.WndPriceRange= #{wndPriceRange}, ctwnd.WndSaleHours= #{wndSaleHours}, ctwnd.WndPayment= #{wndPayment}, ctwnd.WndDescription= #{wndDescription}, ctwnd.WndNote= #{wndNote} WHERE ctwnd.WndID=#{wndID}

Insert into ctwnd (ctwnd.WndCantID, ctwnd.WndName,ctwnd.WndAddr, ctwnd.WndPriceRange,ctwnd.WndSaleHours, ctwnd.WndPayment,ctwnd.WndDescription, ctwnd.WndNote) values (#{wndCantID}, #{wndName},#{wndAddr}, #{wndPriceRange},#{wndSaleHours}, #{wndPayment},#{wndDescription}, #{wndNote})
